description:
Things definitely got a little out of hand in this one!
Just before the shoot, Wagner mentioned he had messed around with guys before, and likely wouldn't be too nervous.
So pushed him a little bit and had fun with it, without going too far.
Longish video for "just a massage" but I just pretty much only took 3 "cuts" out of it. One for doing the photos and twice moving cameras around a bit for position changes.
Otherwise, this video is pretty much is an "As It Happened" video. Might not be important to you all, but I think when there are limited interruptions, you can really tell the chemistry and the action is about as real as it gets!
title: Bryan & Wagner - Serviced
